objectives: Students will discuss education and learning using Informal/Conversational register language
Students will engage with Historical themed scenarios related to education and learning
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of informal level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining education and learning content with Historical narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore education and learning through a Historical lens using Informal/Conversational language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a historical period or event involving education and learning

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice informal register vocabulary related to education and learning in a historical context
Students engage in historical themed role-play about education and learning using informal register
Students create original historical themed content about education and learning in informal register

discussion_questions: How would you describe education and learning in a Historical scenario?
What tradition or heritage might be involved in education and learning?
Can you create a Historical story about education and learning?
How does education and learning change when viewed through a Historical perspective?
What informal register expressions would you use to discuss this historical scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Historical situation involving education and learning
roles: Character A: Using informal register in historical context
Character B: Responding in informal register within historical theme

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Informal/Conversational throughout: Friendly, relaxed everyday speech
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Historical theme: Past eras, historical events, period settings

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Informal/Conversational register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Historical themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of informal register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
